address."}}]},"events":{"ContractActivated(address)":{"params":{"_kingAddress":"The king's address."}},"ContractPaused(address)":{"params":{"_kingAddress":"The king's Initializes contract state to Active.","params":{"_kingAddress":"The king's address."}},"currentKing()":{"returns":{"_0":"Current king's address."}},"isContractActive()":{"returns":{"_0":"`true` if the contract is active, `false` if paused."}},"isKing(address)":{"returns":{"_0":"`true` if address is the king, otherwise `false`."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AlreadyActive()":[{"notice":"Thrown for an already active contract."}],"AlreadyPaused()":[{"notice":"Thrown for an already paused contract."}],"InvalidKing(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown for invalid address (zero or this address)."}],"PausedContract()":[{"notice":"Thrown for paused contract."}],"Unauthorized(address,address)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the caller is not the king."}]},"events":{"ContractActivated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the king activates the contract."},"ContractPaused(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the king pauses the contract."},"KingshipTransferred(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the zero address transfers kingship to king at deployment."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"activateContract()":{"notice":"Activates the contract."},"currentKing()":{"notice":"Returns the current king's address."},"isContractActive()":{"notice":"Returns the current contract state."},"isKing(address)":{"notice":"Checks if the given address is the current king."},"pauseContract()":{"notice":"Pauses the contract."}},"notice":"Created on the 23rd of Sept, 2025.         This contract sets the king at deployment (Initial king can be EOAs or contract address),            restricts access to some functions with the modifier \"onlyKing\".         Allows the king to pause and activate the contract, and restrict access to some functions using the whenActive modifier.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/access/extensions/KingPausable.sol":"KingPausable"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/access/extensions/KingPausable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x44b92f617858b3b4395b9605703672bc6cb4d09628d5412219e2247d84dbfc90","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://18205c8bb35623b221e58292f6c1386e288a4b53126c8c094919831c294aa563","dweb:/ipfs/QmUHF1XFCQTF1mqpWBTYFKA1fBokGW3nVnx5Avzh5RFSxe"]}},"version":1}

constructor.details: Sets the initial king.          Initializes contract state to Active.

returns._0: `true` if the contract is active, `false` if paused.
`true` if address is the king, otherwise `false`.

isKing(address).notice: Checks if the given address is the current king.
